title.value: The influence of the construction of connections of ploughshares on lengthwise even distribution of seeds
Влияние конструкции патрубков сошников на продольную равномерность распределения семян

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Klochkov, A.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: We have presented results of research into the determination of the influence of construction of connections of four ploughshares on lengthwise even distribution of seeds in a row. The highest average lengthwise even distribution of seeds is provided by connection of the ploughshare of aggregate MegaSeed and amounts to 96.0%. It is characteristic for all the four examined ploughshares that the highest frequency of intervals between seeds is within the range of 0 to 20 mm. It is necessary to further examine the factors, which influence lengthwise even distribution of seeds and find ways of increasing it
